alert.note: Alert for Four Corners, Upper Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 23 at 1:58PM MDT until April 24 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Four Corners/Upper Dolores River. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
